page.title: 19LEISURE PURSUITS
page.content: IN THIS RURAL AREA LEISURE PURSUITS ARE MOSTLY OUTDOOR AND DIFFER WITH AGE GROUPS. YOUNGER PEOPLE ENJOY MOSTLY ANIMAL CARE, ESPECIALLY HORSE RIDING AND TRAINING, ALSO TEAM GAMES SUCH AS CRICKET. GOLF AND AQUATIC SPORTS ARE POPULAR AT WEEKENDS . WITH MIDDLE AGED PEOPLE, THE INTERESTS ARE SIMILAR BUT WITH A FOCUS ON NATIONAL AS WELL AS LOCAL EVENTS. ELDERLY AND RETIRED PEOPLE ENJOY GARDENING, ANIMAL CARE INCLUDING BEE KEEPING AND WATCHING NATIONAL EVENTS. INTERESTS IN LOCAL EVENTS INCLUDES THE R.S.P.C.A, THE ROYAL BRITISH LEGION , FLOWER AND PLANT SHOWS , DRAMATIC AND MUSICAL EVENTS.INDOOR PURSUITS GENERALLY APPLY TO ALL AGES. CRAFTS , MODELLING AND LITERATURE MAY OFTEN BE A FULL TIME OCCUPATION. ALL FORMS OF THE MEDIA ARE SUPERSEDED BY CREATIVE PURSUITS, BUT TELEVISED CULTURAL EVENTS ARE POPULAR.
